title: A Demon and Her Scot
description: Alternate cover edition ~ ASIN B00EJWZDYIAn unlikely duo, the golfing match from Hell, and a devil determined to win, even if he has to cheat. Lucifer’s up to his matchmaking mischief again in this fast-paced, humorous jaunt into the bowels of the pit. Think you can handle the heat?“Fetch me a Scot,” Lucifer commands. Sounds simple, except the skirt-wearing jerk won’t cooperate. But Aella isn’t one to give up. Willing or not, she delivers her target to the Lord of Sin. In retaliation, the much-too-sexy Scot has Aella assigned as his bodyguard for the golfing match from Hell.One shot ruined Niall’s life. A second shot could help him regain it. Niall sold his soul once to win a lady’s heart only to end up betrayed. Does he dare take a risk and give love a second chance?__________________________The Welcome to Hell series (is best read in order for full enjoyment of Lucifer and his ongoing matchmaking attempts):Book One: A Demon and His WitchBook Two: A Demon and His PsychoBook Two and a Half: Date with DeathBook Three: A Demon and Her Scot
author: Eve Langlais
